name: Meme Network
description: Meme Network is a MEME-friendly ecosystem based on Web 3.0 feature “High Transparency”, “Irreversible Data” and “Collective Consensus”. Our tools assist user freely read and write information, as well as rewarding contributor. Traditional MEME encounters obstacles of idea transmission. The service providers in web 2.0 manipulates information that stopping MEME development. MEME desires an information-free channel to continuously spreading idea. In the roadmap, there are several tools are being developed, I.e., Meme painter (then mint to NFT), Meme related NFT marketplace and its wallet, Web 3.0 instant messenger etc.
